cgcloud__Job_Definition_List__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_List__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_List__c.description: Stores the set of questions or surveys that are to be carried out in the respective call and contains further relevant configurations.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates that the activity is available for use.

cgcloud__Activity_Question_Score__c.description: Sum of scores of the questions in the activity.

cgcloud__Activity_Score__c.description: Activity Score that's to be considered for activity performance evaluation on Mobility.

cgcloud__Approval_State__c.description: Specifies whether the activity is created by a field sales activity. The activity can be either valid (Approved), canceled via field sales activity (Canceled), or independent of a field sales activity (NotRelevant).

cgcloud__Consider_Account__c.description: Relevant for Standard activity: Restricted to Customers.

cgcloud__Consider_History__c.description: If yes, the system determines historic products for product surveys.

cgcloud__Consider_Listing__c.description: If yes, the system determines listed products for product surveys.

cgcloud__Consider_Products__c.description: If yes, the system determines products that are directly assigned to the activity for product surveys.

cgcloud__Consider_Score__c.description: Indicates whether the activity is score relevant.

cgcloud__Default_Management_Type__c.description: Specifies the default management type that's to be considered during the user determination process while creating job lists out of non-standard activity.

cgcloud__Field_Sales_Activity__c.description: Reference to a field sales activity. Empty for a stand alone activity.

cgcloud__Mark_for_Deletion__c.description: Deletion flag. Users who maintain job definition lists can mark the job definition list for deletion. The system administrator have the permissions to delete the activity.

cgcloud__Restrict_Org_Unit__c.description: Controls the determination of valid users that are restricted to the org unit assigned to the customer when creating job list out of a non-standard activity.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the activity belongs.

cgcloud__Standard_Jobs__c.description: If yes, specifies a Standard activity.

cgcloud__Threshold_Fulfilled__c.description: Defines the upper threshold limit for the activity score.

cgcloud__Threshold_Partially_Fulfilled__.description: Defines the lower threshold limit for the activity score.

cgcloud__User_Policy__c.description: Controls the determination of valid users when the activity is activated. The attribute controls the valid users by interpreting main management relation between users and Customers.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the validity period begins.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date on which the validity period ends.

cgcloud__Visit_Template_Description__c.description: Description of the linked visit template.
